title: CDN Plugin
desc:
Applicable Scenarios: For uploading attachments to a personal or company designated CDN source and obtaining CDN links.
Currently Supported: Alibaba Cloud √ Tencent Cloud × Qiniu Cloud ×. If there is a need for other CDN sources, please join the plugin group and contact the author.
ossTip: Tip: Please fill in the following Alibaba Cloud OSS configuration information

placeholder.bucket: Please fill in the bucket name
placeholder.attachment: Please select the field where the attachment is located
placeholder.link: Please select the field where the link is located
placeholder.width: Please enter the expected image width
placeholder.height: Please enter the expected image height

fieldSelectedTip: Tip: Please select the attachment field, link field, and image processing parameters (optional)
imageReshapeTip: Tip: Please select the image processing method

toast.lackRequiredInfo: Please fill in the necessary information

tooltip.fill: Center and scale the original image proportionally, cropping the excess parts
tooltip.pad: Center and scale the original image proportionally, filling the excess parts with white
